question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option1: Impeachment of the President Can be initiated in any house of the parliament
option2: Winston Churchill called Mahatma Gandhi as a “Naked Faqir”
option3: Megasthenes has written in detail about slavery in India that was prevalent in Mauryan Era
option4: Raj Rajeshwar temple was built by Chola Kings as Tanjore
answer: Megasthenes has written in detail about slavery in India that was prevalent in Mauryan Era
explanation: Slavery in India was not prevalent and megasthenes said that there was no slavery
